Package me.bowlmates.bowlmatesbackend.Controllers

Class UserController

java.lang.Object
me.bowlmates.bowlmatesbackend.Controllers.UserController
@RestController @RequestMapping(path="/user") public class UserController extends Object
REST Controller for user requests

  • Method Details

    • user

      @GetMapping(value="/", produces="application/json") public Map<String,String> user()
      Landing page for user
      Returns:
      a Map with message signifying user level

    • setRestPreferences

      @PostMapping("/prefs/save") public void setRestPreferences(@RequestBody RestaurantDTO body)
      Adds restaurants to user's favorites
      Parameters:
      body - RestaurantDTO list of favorite restaurants

    • getRestPreferences

      @GetMapping(value="/prefs", produces="application/json") public Set<RestaurantDTO> getRestPreferences()
      Provides set of user's favorite restaurants
      Returns:
      Set of RestaurantDTO objects tied to user

    • getAllRestaurants

      @GetMapping(value="/rests", produces="application/json") public Set<RestaurantDTO> getAllRestaurants()
      Gets all restaurants
      Returns:
      a Set of RestaurantDTO objects representing all restaurants

    • getAvailability

      @GetMapping(value="/avail", produces="application/json") public List<AvailabilityDTO> getAvailability()
      Provides frontend with user availability
      Returns:
      a List of AvailabilityDTO objects representing times user is available

    • setAvailability

      @PostMapping("/avail/save") public void setAvailability(@RequestBody List<AvailabilityDTO> availabilityDTOList)
      Updates user availability from frontend
      Parameters:
      availabilityDTOList - List of AvailabilityDTO representing user availability

    • runMatches

      @GetMapping("/match") public void runMatches()
      updates the users matching queue

    • showMatches

      @GetMapping(value="/match/show", produces="application/json") public List<Integer> showMatches()
      returns a list of the users potential matches based on their ranking from the matching algorithm
      Returns:
      an ordered list of integers representing user ids (ordered by matching potential)

    • approve

      @PostMapping("/match/approve") public List<Integer> approve(@RequestBody Integer userId)
      used when a user approves another user
      Parameters:
      userId - the other user to be approved
      Returns:
      an updated list of the matching queue minus the most recent approved user

    • reject

      @PostMapping("/match/reject") public List<Integer> reject(@RequestBody Integer userId)
      used when a user rejects another user
      Parameters:
      userId - the other user to be rejected
      Returns:
      an updated list of the matching queue minus the most recent rejected user

    • unmatch

      @PostMapping("/unmatch") public void unmatch(@RequestBody Integer userId)
      Used when a user wants a match removed from their matches
      Parameters:
      userId - id of user to unmatch

    • getProfile

      @GetMapping("/profile") public ProfileDTO getProfile() throws Exception
      Provides frontend with user profile info
      Returns:
      Profile Data Transfer Object
      Throws:
      Exception - When unable to authenticate user

    • setProfile

      @PostMapping("/profile/save") public void setProfile(@RequestBody ProfileDTO profileDTO) throws Exception
      Updates user profile info from frontend
      Parameters:
      profileDTO - Data Transfer Object with profile info
      Throws:
      Exception - when user fails to authenticate

    • getPhoto

      @GetMapping(value="/photo", produces="application/json") public String getPhoto() throws Exception
      Provides frontend mapping to profile photo
      Returns:
      String with mapping to profile photo
      Throws:
      Exception - when user fails to authenticate

    • setPhoto

      @PostMapping("/photo/save") public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<String> setPhoto(@RequestParam("image") org.springframework.web.multipart.MultipartFile photo) throws Exception
      Updates user profile photo from frontend
      Parameters:
      photo - image file to set profile pic to
      Returns:
      Status message
      Throws:
      Exception - when user fails to authenticate

    • getMessages

      @PostMapping("/message") public List<List<MessageDTO>> getMessages(@RequestBody List<Integer> matchIds)
      Provides the frontend with a users conversations
      Parameters:
      matchIds - List of matchIds for user's matches
      Returns:
      List of conversations, which are lists of messages

    • sendMessage

      @PostMapping("/message/send") public void sendMessage(@RequestBody MessageDTO messageDTO)
      Records sent message from frontend
      Parameters:
      messageDTO - Data Transfer Object of message to be sent

    • getMatchHashes

      @GetMapping("/matches") public List<MatchDTO> getMatchHashes()
      Provides frontend with profile info of matches and matchIds
      Returns:
      a list of Match Data Transfer Objects containing matchId and profile info

    • test

      @GetMapping(value="/test", produces="application/json") public Map<String,String> test()
      Function for integration testing
      Returns:
      Map of String with message

    • setImage

      @PostMapping("/image/save") public Boolean setImage(@RequestBody String body)
